name: Popcorn Popping - Arcade Time!
description:
+++ 24-hour discount! 100% FREE! Popcorn Time!! +++

“Pop All Corn”
“Beat Your Friends”
“Unique Features”
_____________________


It’s the time to play with Popcorn. Download this unique game of popcorn in your iPhone/iPad today. What you have to do is just tap on the screen and start the game, hit the popcorn and collect them in the bucket to get a high score. The more popcorn you will collect inside the bucket the more will be your score. Different power ups are available once you hit the popcorn. You will find new and interesting levels, which are really fun to play. You can challenge your friends also. This a unique game that has striking graphics and background colors which makes it more interesting to play. Play it today. You will surely love it.

GAME FEATURES

“Pop All Corn”
“Get a High Score”
“Different Power Ups Available”
